reviews.review_msg: Nice teacher, she makes the material, is very available for help and gives you tons of helpful comments on papers. Her marking is fair. She encouraged discussion in the class. Only issue was that sometimes that discussion detracted from my knowledge (ie; super specific student questions that she wouldn't nip in the bud) I highly re commend her!
Absolutely delightful. An entertaining man teaching a soft course with no final? Perfection. Great facilitator for discussion, plus he wrote and photocopied all our notes for us!
I don't understand all the comments on his being boring and having crappy notes.  He was so animated, had great class discussions, and the notes helped make things much clearer.
Good sense of humour, fair marker, and overall one of the best profs I've ever had.

A bit eccentric, teaches great classes - with a lot of emphasis on discussion. Open to other people's imput. The man is what every philosophy prof should be. Is also a bit quirky and bizarre in his way. Great Sense of Humour.. has Nietzschean Eyebrows. A+
